Question
========

Which method in scikit-learn estimators is used to estimate the parameters of a 
model using the training data?

Answerlist
----------

* `fit()`
* `predict()`
* `score()`
* `transform()`

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* True
* This is used *after* fitting; to make predictions.
* This returns the *score* (e.g. $R^2$ or RMSE) on a new dataset, after fitting has been done.
* This is also only called *after* fitting: to transform a dataset, e.g. scaling, PCA, etc.
